content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-40.5, -113.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (-40.5, -113.5) (Status: Not operational, warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections)
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5) connected to Pipe Group (fluid system 52674) starting at Position (-46.5, -122.5)
- Pipe Group (fluid system 52674) connecting the Offshore Pump to the Steam Engine, with multiple pipes at positions including (-46.5, -122.5), (-47.5, -122.5), (-46.5, -121.5), etc.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) (Status: No fuel, warnings: out of fuel, chest at drop position is full)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5) (Inventory: 109 iron ore)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) (Status: No fuel, warnings: out of fuel)
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) (Status: No ingredients, warnings: no ingredients to smelt)
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0) (Status: No ingredients, warnings: no ingredients to smelt)
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) (Inventory: 10 iron plates)
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) (Status: No power, warnings: not receiving electricity)

### Electricity Network
Consists of:
- Multiple Small Electric Poles at various positions including (-39.5, -116.5), (-38.5, -113.5), (5.5, -60.5), etc.
- Electricity Group with poles at positions including (15.5, -71.5), (-23.5, -69.5), (-20.5, -68.5), etc.

### Miscellaneous
- Lab (Status: No power)
- Multiple Pipe Groups (fluid systems 52680, 52687, 52693, 52698, 52699, 52700) at various positions, all empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Entities to Power Network
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities to the power network.
- Verify that all components are correctly connected and that there are no missing connections in your power network.

### Steam Engine Not Operational
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a source of input liquid and that the necessary fluid is present in the connections.

### Errors Due to Lack of Fuel
- Regularly check and refuel entities like burner mining drills and stone furnaces to keep them operational.

### Inserter Not Receiving Electricity
- Ensure that inserters are within the coverage area of powered electric poles to receive electricity.

### Chest Full Warning
- Regularly empty chests to prevent mining drills from halting due to full inventory space.
